name: VoiceActivity
author: Neodymium
description: Shows icons and info in popouts, the member list, and more when someone is in a voice channel.

changelog.title: Changed
items: Removed user profile section and related options. (Discord now has a native voice channel activity card, and also displays multiple activities in popouts!)
This plugin still corrects some of the native profile behavior, including displaying the voice channel info everywhere in the app, instead of only in relevant servers.
